Package frc.robot.controls

Class FlightStick

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
frc.robot.controls.FlightStick
Direct Known Subclasses:
LogitechPro
public abstract class FlightStick extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
An abstract class the can be extended to allow calibrated retrieval of each joystick axis by name.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • FlightStick

      protected FlightStick(int port, String joystickType)
      Creates a new FlightStick in the given port.
      Parameters:
      port - the port the joystick is assigned to in the driver station
      joystickType - the name of the joystick in the SmartDashboard.

  • Method Details

      Gets the provided axis in the range -1.0 to 1.0.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the current value of the axis in the range -1.0 to 1.0.
